name: skip :ohno: (@skipcloud@inane.chat)
summary:
I just had my first real scary production engineering oncall alert: "there are no free hosts on the production cluster" ðŸ˜± 

No more hosts were being added AND the cluster needed to scale up very very quickly given the time of day.

I managed to un-fuck the situation all by myself! And without any real issues. That could've been a very bad night for me, I'm proud of myself for sorting it out :)

#oncall #ProductionEngineering
